name: Super JumpKick Turbo
description:
Super JumpKick Turbo is a simple DiveKick clone, originally written for the OpenPandora handheld computer many years ago. So I decided to dust it off, recompile it for x64 devices and re-release it.

It's a two button fighting game, with a one hit KO. You can play vs the computer, a second local player, or over a network. You might get the odd desync on network games, but I'm pretty sure it worked pretty well when I last tried it.

Default controls are Left Shift and Left Control for the left player, and Right Shift and Right Control for the right player. XInput controllers are also supported.

On Linux, there's a bug which prevents the process from shutting down. I haven't been able to work out what is causing this, so bear that in mind.

Built using Allegro 5 and enet, with OpenGameArt assets, and music with permission from naildown55 on NewGrounds
